entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with a few flurries and rain showers beginning overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers changing to a few rain showers near noon. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
